title: Classic Cheeseburger
ingredients: Beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, sesame seed bun
recipe:
1. Grill or fry beef patty until cooked to desired doneness.
2. Toast sesame seed bun on the grill.
3. Layer lettuce, tomato, pickles, and cheese on the bottom bun.
4. Place cooked patty on top.
5. Close with the top bun .

title: Pepperoni Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni slices
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 450°F.
2. Roll out pizza dough and spread marinara sauce evenly.
3. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
4. Arrange pepperoni slices on top.
5. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

title: Margarita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, marinara sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 475°F.
2. Roll out pizza dough and spread marinara sauce evenly.
3. Tear fresh mozzarella into pieces and distribute over the sauce.
4. Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is melted.

title: Mojito
ingredients: White rum, fresh lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, soda water
recipe:
1. Muddle mint leaves and sugar in a glass.
2. Add fresh lime juice and mix well.
3. Fill the glass with ice.
4. Pour white rum over the ice.
5. Top with soda water, stir gently, and garnish with mint leaves and lime wedges.

title: Strawberry Daiquiri
ingredients: White rum, lime juice, simple syrup, fresh strawberries
recipe:
1. Blend fresh strawberries until smooth.
2. Pour blended strawberries into a shaker.
3. Add white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup.

title: Iced Caramel Macchiato
recipe:
1. Brew espresso and let it cool.
2. Fill a glass with ice.
3. Pour milk over the ice.
4. Drizzle caramel syrup over the milk.
5. Slowly pour the cooled espresso over the milk.
6. Stir gently and serve immediately.
